targets.rawSQL:
-- Channel Analysis with Unique Tokens per Channel (ch01-ch10) - Fixed Grafana Variables
SELECT 
  channel,
  COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) AS total_unique_ips,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' THEN 1 END) AS index_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' THEN 1 END) AS ll_index_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END) AS index_720p_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END) AS ll_index_720p_requests,
  
  -- Total unique tokens across all manifest types
  approx_distinct(regexp_extract(request_url, 'servers8\.com/([^/]+)/live/', 1)) AS total_unique_tokens,
  
  -- Unique tokens for each file type
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'servers8\.com/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_index,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'servers8\.com/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_ll_index,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'servers8\.com/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_720p,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'servers8\.com/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_ll_720p,
  
  -- Platform breakdown
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR 
     user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR 
     user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%') THEN 1 END) AS lg_tv_requests,
     
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR 
     user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR user_agent LIKE '%Maple%') THEN 1 END) AS samsung_tv_requests,
     
  COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR 
         user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR 
         user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%' OR user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR 
         user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR user_agent LIKE '%Maple%') THEN 1 END) AS other_platform_requests

FROM (
  SELECT *, 
    CASE 
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch01/%' THEN 'ch01'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch02/%' THEN 'ch02'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch03/%' THEN 'ch03'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch04/%' THEN 'ch04'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch05/%' THEN 'ch05'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch06/%' THEN 'ch06'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch07/%' THEN 'ch07'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch08/%' THEN 'ch08'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch09/%' THEN 'ch09'
      WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch10/%' THEN 'ch10'
    END AS channel
  FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
  WHERE (
    (year = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL '8' HOUR, '%Y')
     AND month = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL '8' HOUR, '%m')
     AND day = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL '8' HOUR, '%d'))
    OR
    (year = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL '7' HOUR, '%Y')
     AND month = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL '7' HOUR, '%m')
     AND day = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL '7' HOUR, '%d'))
  )
  AND date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s') >= date_parse('${date_game} ${start_time}:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') + INTERVAL '8' HOUR
  AND date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s') <= date_parse('${date_game} ${end_time}:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') + INTERVAL '8' HOUR
  AND request_url LIKE '%servers8.com/%/live/%'
  AND (request_url LIKE '%/ch01/%' OR request_url LIKE '%/ch02/%' OR request_url LIKE '%/ch03/%' OR 
       request_url LIKE '%/ch04/%' OR request_url LIKE '%/ch05/%' OR request_url LIKE '%/ch06/%' OR 
       request_url LIKE '%/ch07/%' OR request_url LIKE '%/ch08/%' OR request_url LIKE '%/ch09/%' OR 
       request_url LIKE '%/ch10/%')
  AND (request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8%')
) 
WHERE channel IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY channel
ORDER BY channel;

-- Channel Analysis with Unique Tokens per Channel (ch01-ch10)
SELECT 
  channel,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c_ip) AS total_unique_ips,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS index_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS ll_index_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS index_720p_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS ll_index_720p_requests,
  
  -- Unique tokens for each file type
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_index,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_ll_index,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_720p,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_ll_720p,
  
  -- Platform breakdown
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR 
     cs_user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR 
     cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%') THEN 1 END) AS lg_tv_requests,
     
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (cs_user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR 
     cs_user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Maple%') THEN 1 END) AS samsung_tv_requests,
     
  COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR 
         cs_user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR 
         cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR 
         cs_user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Maple%') THEN 1 END) AS other_platform_requests

FROM (
  SELECT *, 
    CASE 
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch01/%' THEN 'ch01'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch02/%' THEN 'ch02'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch03/%' THEN 'ch03'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch04/%' THEN 'ch04'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch05/%' THEN 'ch05'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch06/%' THEN 'ch06'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch07/%' THEN 'ch07'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch08/%' THEN 'ch08'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch09/%' THEN 'ch09'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch10/%' THEN 'ch10'
    END AS channel
  FROM "cdn_logs_cloudfront_partitioned"."access_logs_parquet" 
  WHERE year = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y')
    AND month = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d'), '%m')
    AND day = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d'), '%d')
    AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= timestamp '${date_game} ${start_time}'
    AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= timestamp '${date_game} ${end_time}'
    AND (cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch01/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch02/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch03/%' OR 
         cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch04/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch05/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch06/%' OR 
         cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch07/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch08/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch09/%' OR 
         cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch10/%')
    AND (cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index.m3u8' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8')
) 
WHERE channel IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY channel
ORDER BY channel;

-- Channel Analysis with Unique Tokens per Channel (ch01-ch10)
SELECT 
  channel,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c_ip) AS total_unique_ips,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS index_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS ll_index_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS index_720p_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8' THEN 1 END) AS ll_index_720p_requests,
  
  -- Unique tokens for each file type
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_index,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_ll_index,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_720p,
  approx_distinct(CASE WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8' THEN regexp_extract(cs_uri_stem, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) END) AS unique_tokens_ll_720p,
  
  -- Platform breakdown
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR 
     cs_user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR 
     cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%') THEN 1 END) AS lg_tv_requests,
     
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (cs_user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR 
     cs_user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Maple%') THEN 1 END) AS samsung_tv_requests,
     
  COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Web0S%' OR 
         cs_user_agent LIKE '%SmartTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%WebAppManager%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%LGTV%' OR 
         cs_user_agent LIKE '%webOS.TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SMART-TV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SamsungBrowser%' OR 
         cs_user_agent LIKE '%Tizen%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%SAMSUNGTV%' OR cs_user_agent LIKE '%Maple%') THEN 1 END) AS other_platform_requests

FROM (
  SELECT *, 
    CASE 
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch01/%' THEN 'ch01'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch02/%' THEN 'ch02'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch03/%' THEN 'ch03'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch04/%' THEN 'ch04'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch05/%' THEN 'ch05'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch06/%' THEN 'ch06'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch07/%' THEN 'ch07'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch08/%' THEN 'ch08'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch09/%' THEN 'ch09'
      WHEN cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch10/%' THEN 'ch10'
    END AS channel
  FROM "cdn_logs_cloudfront_partitioned"."access_logs_parquet" 
  WHERE year = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y')
    AND month = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d'), '%m')
    AND day = date_format(date_parse('${date_game}', '%Y-%m-%d'), '%d')
    AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= timestamp '${date_game} ${start_time}'
    AND date_parse(concat(date, ' ', time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= timestamp '${date_game} ${end_time}'
    AND (cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch01/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch02/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch03/%' OR 
         cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch04/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch05/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch06/%' OR 
         cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch07/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch08/%' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch09/%' OR 
         cs_uri_stem LIKE '%/ch10/%')
    AND (cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index.m3u8' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%index_720p.m3u8' OR cs_uri_stem LIKE '%ll-index_720p.m3u8')
) 
WHERE channel IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY channel
ORDER BY channel;
